bug.short_desc: Manual for switching mobile themes is not up-to-date

long_desc.thetext:
The steps in the paragraph "Switching themes in your qx.Mobile application" of http://qooxdoo.readthedocs.org/en/latest/pages/mobile/theming.html don't work anymore:
Changing the MOBILE_THEME to "flat" in the config.json has no effect. The reason is that the mobile app skeleton does not contain a flat.scss in its resource folder anymore.
We should either adapt the manual (and point out that changing themes works via adapting the app's default SCSS) or provide the mobile app skeleton with the tweo qooxdoo theme-files flat.scss and indigo.scss.
I would suggest to adapt the manual.

The text inside the manual is right. It is just a hint of how to switch between multiple (user-) generated themes. There is nowhere written that you can switch between the indigo or the flat theme with this macro.

I changed that part of the manual, for proposing information to enable that qx.Mobile app appear in flat theme.
Removed that other part "Switching mobile theme" because it is not important anymore.
